settings.title: Take 5-days to make your health goals a priority!
settings.details: If you’re ready for a much-needed reset to lose weight gained during the past few months, then the ProLon® Fasting Mimicking Diet can definitely help.

settings.description:
Fasting with ProLon offers an exceptional way to help you quickly start to lose weight and shed excess belly fat, so you can soon begin to look, feel and perform your best! A 5-day cycle of ProLon once a month for four months vs an everyday heart-healthy diet was clinically shown to help individuals:

  • Lose an average of 8.2 lbs. and 1.6 inches off their waist circumference
  • Reduce that hard-to-lose, visceral (belly fat)
  • Lower BMI as effectively as a heart-healthy diet every day for 120 days
  • Achieve a similar weight loss effect as a heart-healthy diet every day for 120 days

settings.title: Cellular Clean-up
settings.description: ProLon supports the body’s natural process of cellular clean-up, triggered when it’s in a prolonged fasting state.

settings.title: Fat Focused Weight Loss
settings.description: Kickstart weight loss (on average 5 pounds), especially belly fat, while protecting lean body mass.

settings.title: Enhance Clarity
settings.description: Customers report feeling greater focus and clarity toward the end and after completing the fast.

settings.title: More Energy
settings.description: The majority of ProLon users surveyed said they had more energy after completing the fast.

settings.title:
Benefits Beyond Weight loss

The ProLon Fasting Mimicking Diet is a tasty 5-day meal plan unlike any other; one that offers a scientific combination of plant-based foods, to not only initiate weight loss and fat reduction, but also enable you to experience additional physical benefits...

settings.mdesc: I discovered ProLon last January and I have been doing it consistently ever since then. It is a really great reset for your body, especially after holidays. It has so many different benefits, it curbs sugar cravings and helps me manage portion control.
settings.author: - WHITNEY

settings.mdesc: Not only can I stick to ProLon when I can’t stick to other diets, it helps jumpstart into whatever diet that I am planning to do after. Prolon motivates me... it just works for me.
settings.author: -KIMBERLY

settings.mtitle: I loved it... my wife loved it!
settings.mdesc: I think this program is actually a perfect example of practicing self-discipline. Anyone that wants to get batter in that aspect of their lives, while improving overall physical health, I think ProLon is a great opportunity to do just that.
settings.author: -DAVID

settings.mdesc: How are you going to feel after 5 days... Amazing! No belly bloat, you are going to lose weight, have more energy, and all your cravings for sugar... GONE! You have to give this a try.
settings.author: -AUDREY

settings.title: You may not realize it but you’re already fasting.
settings.details:
Every night when you go to sleep, your body goes into a fasting state. The human body was
designed to fast but modern life intervened. Tap into your natural instincts with ProLon.
